EventSuggestion.Item: 1. Check for high temperature alarm of air inlet or outlet.@#AB;2. Check for fan alarms.@#AB;3. Check whether the air duct is installed.@#AB;4. Check whether the CPU heat sink or liquid cooling device is correctly installed.@#AB;@#AB;5. Replace the mainboard.
1. Remove the DIMMs connected to the CPU and check if the alarm is caused by the DIMMs. If yes, replace the faulty DIMMs. If no, replace the mainboard.

1. Replace the mainboard
1. Check whether the hard disk is properly inserted.@#AB;2. Replace the NVMe cable or SAS cable.@#AB;3. Replace the hard disk backplane or transfer card.@#AB;4. Replace the mainboard.
1. Power off the server and check whether there is damage or poor contact between the component and its slot.@#AB;2. Replace the mainboard.
1. Check whether CPU is installed.@#AB;2 .replace the mainboard.

1、检查服务器是否同时存在进风口/出风口高温告警。@#AB;2、检查服务器是否同时存在风扇告警。@#AB;3、检查服务器是否已安装导风罩。@#AB;4、检查是否正确安装CPU散热器或液冷装置。@#AB;5、更换主板。
1、拔掉该CPU下挂内存，确定告警是否由内存引起。如果告警由内存产生，更换内存。如果告警非内存产生，更换主板。
1、拔掉该CPU下挂内存，确定告警是否由内存引起。如果告警由内存产生，更换内存。如果告警非内存产生，更换主板。

1、更换主板
1、检查硬盘是否插好。@#AB;2、更换NVMe线缆或者SAS线缆。@#AB;3、更换硬盘背板或转接卡。@#AB;4、更换主板。
